articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Letter to Those Attending of the 8th Congress of UAWK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Letter to Those Attending of the 8th Congress of UAWK
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a letter "On Improving the Role of the UAWK in Accomplishing the Juche-Oriented Socialist Cause" to those attending of the 8th Congress of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) on Tuesday.
					 The letter said:
					
					 In this stirring period, when the service personnel and people worked a miracle of turning a misfortune into blessing on the front of rehabilitating the disaster-stricken northern areas in North Hamgyong Province true to the militant call of the Party and are flying the flag of the victorious 200-day campaign in many places of building a powerful socialist country, the Eighth Congress of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea is being held.
					
					 This congress will constitute an important occasion in honouring the imperishable exploits performed by the great leaders for the development of the UAWK and stepping up the building of a powerful socialist country by improving the role of its organizations under the Party's leadership.
					
					 I warmly congratulate the congress and extend militant greetings to those attending it and all other officials of the UAWK and agricultural workers.
					
					 The UAWK is a mass-based political organization of our socialist agricultural workers which was founded and has developed under the wise guidance of the great leaders, and a reliable transmission belt and peripheral organization of the Party. 
					
					 The great Comrade Kim Il Sung, based on the unique idea and tradition of building a Juche-oriented peasants organization he created in the days of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, founded a patriotic and revolutionary peasants union after the liberation of the country. He ensured that changes were brought about in resolving the problems of peasants and agriculture by implementing the historic agrarian reform and agricultural cooperativization and carrying on the socialist rural theses; and in step with the intensification of the revolution and construction, he saw to it that the peasants union was developed into the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea. 
					
					 The great Comrade Kim Jong Il provided energetic guidance to defend and honour Comrade Kim Il Sung's idea of and exploits in socialist rural construction and make UAWK organizations creditably perform their duties as organizations for ideological education. He ensured that the union held fast to carrying out the socialist rural theses as its central task and further improved the role of its organizations in the gigantic practical struggle for increasing agricultural production, realigning crop fields and building gravitational waterways.
					
					 The UAWK and agricultural workers, in support of the leadership of the Party and the leaders in every decade of the revolution, strived to consolidate the class position in the countryside and fulfil their responsibility and basic duty as masters of the agricultural front.
					
					 Peasants, who after the liberation of the country became the masters of their lands and their country under the benevolence of Comrade Kim Il Sung, launched the campaigns for increasing agricultural production and donating cereals out of patriotism, and thus faithfully supported the Party's line of nation building. In the grim days of the Fatherland Liberation War they fought self-sacrificingly even during indiscriminate bombing by enemy aircraft, so as to send the front larger amounts of food grains. In the difficult postwar days, following Comrade Kim Il Sung with firm trust in him, they carried out the Party's policy on agricultural cooperativization, and thus transformed the rural economy on the socialist lines in a short period and developed it remarkably; in this way, they confirmed through practice the advantages of the collective economy.
					
					 In the days of the Arduous March and forced march, the agricultural workers made tireless efforts to defend the socialist rural economic system and increase agricultural production without hesitating or vacillating in the face of the worst adversity and trials. UAWK organizations and agricultural workers raised a strong wind of collective competition in this year's 70-day campaign and 200-day campaign, and thus brought about a surge in production and achieved excellent results in crop and fruit production.
					
					 I extend warm thanks to the members of the UAWK and all other agricultural workers, who have worked with devotion, dedicating their unstained blood and sweats to the fields of the country out of loyalty and patriotism, to carry out the great leaders' idea on socialist rural construction and the Party's policy on agriculture.
					
					 Today the UAWK and agricultural workers are faced with the heavy and yet honourable task for making a contribution to hastening the final victory of the Juche-oriented socialist cause by carrying out the socialist rural theses true to the programme of modelling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism advanced at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 Agricultural workers, together with the working class, constitute the main force in building a powerful socialist country, and the agricultural front is now a major thrust area in building the country into a socialist economic giant. Only when agricultural workers are trained to be genuine masters of the socialist countryside through an improved role of the UAWK and the agricultural front achieves a great victory as intended by the Party, can our revolutionary position be consolidated rock-solid and the cause of building a powerful socialist country accomplished with success.
					
					 If the UAWK is to fulfil the noble mission and duties it has assumed for the times and the revolution, it should model itself on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					Modelling itself on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism?this is the general objective and general fighting task of the UAWK. It should develop itself into an eternal organization of the great leaders and of the Party by preparing all its members as true Kimilsungists-Kimjongilists and conducting its building and activities as Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il did.
					
					 The UAWK should add further brilliance to the leadership exploits of the great leaders and faithfully support the Party's leadership.
					
					It should hold up the great leaders as the Sun of Juche for all ages and honour their idea of and imperishable exploits in socialist rural construction down through the generations. It should regard their instructions as its guidelines and apply them in its building and activities in a thoroughgoing way.
					
					 Establishing a thoroughgoing system of the Party's unified leadership is the decisive guarantee for modelling the whole UAWK on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. Only when such system is established in the UAWK can its organizations be developed into powerful and militant ones that share ideology with the Party Central Committee, breathe the same breath as it and keep pace with it and fully perform their revolutionary tasks.
					
					 They should establish revolutionary discipline and order by which they conduct all their work in line with the requirements of the Party's ideas and policies, report problems to the Party in time and deal with them according to its conclusion. They should create a revolutionary atmosphere of accepting the Party's ideas and lines as an absolute truth and death-defyingly implementing its policies in any difficult conditions and circumstances.
					
					 The UAWK should mobilize its organizations and agricultural workers to the effort for carrying out socialist rural theses.
					
					 The theses published by Comrade Kim Il Sung clearly explains the fundamental principles, tasks and ways for solving the socialist rural question, including the problem of carrying out the three revolutions?ideological, technological and cultural?in the countryside. It is our Party's programme for socialist rural construction to finally solve the rural question and the militant banner the UAWK should hold up consistently.
					
					 The UAWK should direct primary efforts to carrying out the ideological revolution in the countryside.
					
					 The ideological revolution in the countryside in the new era of the Juche revolution is a higher stage of ideological education, the work of transforming man, aimed at training all the agricultural workers into genuine Kimilsungists-Kimjongilists and Party's faithful agricultural workers in line with the requirements of modelling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 UAWK organizations should take the ideological education to train their members to be Kimilsungists-Kimjongilists as their main duty, and orient to it the contents and methods of ideological education.
					
					 They should intensify the five-point education, with the focus put on education in the greatness of the leaders, so as to train all their members into genuine rural revolutionaries and patriotic farmers possessed of boundless loyalty to the Party and the leaders, Kim Jong Il's patriotism, firm revolutionary faith, high class consciousness and ennobling moral traits.
					
					 They should conduct effective education to arm their members with the Party's agricultural policy. They should make sure that their members have a correct understanding of the Party's agricultural policies and its other policies set out in every period, as well as the Juche farming method.    They should encourage their members to equip themselves with the revolutionary soldier spirit, the spirit of the Paektusan hero youth and the spirit of self-reliance and self-development and apply them in their practical work, thus creating new heroic miracles in the Mallima era.
					
					 They should strengthen the education in collectivism to make their members value the interests of society and the community more than their individual interests, take a sincere part in the collective life and communal labour and find the worth of genuine life in their society and community. They should encourage their members to learn from the ennobling self-sacrificing spirit of the farmer heroes in the Songun era who dedicated their lives without hesitation for the sake of their comrades and collectives, so that revolutionary comradeship and spirit of collective life of helping and caring for one another can pervade in their organizations.
					
					 They should steadily intensify ideological education and struggle among the agricultural workers to thwart the imperialists' moves for ideological and cultural infiltration so as to allow no room for the capitalist ideology and culture and alien lifestyle to infiltrate and to ensure that various kinds of outdated ideological remnants and non-socialist practices are not revealed among them.
					
					 They should conduct ideological education as suited to the preparedness of the agricultural workers and the specific situations in the rural areas. As agricultural work becomes different according to season, political and ideological education should be undertaken in different ways, in a brief and flexible way on the fields in the busy season and in an intensive and profound way in the slack season. They should conduct education in a planned and regular manner by means of the bases for ideological education.
					
					 The educational system established within the UAWK should be run efficiently, and the sense of responsibility and role of the lecturers for study sessions, public lecturers and expositors enhanced. The newspaper Nongop Kulloja and other publications should be responsive to Party policy and demands of the realities, and edited in keeping with the characteristics of the agricultural workers, so that they can become intimate companions of UAWK members and other agricultural workers.   It is also necessary to prepare substantive materials for political work for every period, send them down to lower echelons in time and use them effectively.
					
					 UAWK organizations should push forward the technological and cultural revolutions in the countryside in line with the demands for building a sci-tech power and civilized nation.
					
					 Giving priority to the ideological revolution while pushing forward the technological and cultural revolutions is the basic way of accomplishing the Juche-oriented socialist cause by successfully building a powerful socialist country and ultimately solving the rural question.
					
					 Only when the technological revolution is carried on dynamically in the countryside, can the essential differences between agricultural labour and industrial labour be eliminated, the agricultural workers be freed from backbreaking and hard labour and a rapid increase be brought about in agricultural production.
					
					 UAWK organizations should regard the technological revolution as a vital demand for agricultural development and socialist rural construction and make a positive contribution to achieving a high level of irrigation, electrification, mechanization and application of agrochemicals in the rural economy. They should pay particular attention to the comprehensive mechanization of the rural economy, in order to radically raise the level of mechanization in farm work. They should vigorously conduct the movements for invention, technical conception and technical innovation for agricultural development, and make sure that the agricultural workers possess one or more techniques and know how to operate modern farm machines skilfully. The agricultural workers should be well-versed in agricultural science and technology and advanced farming methods and do all their farm work in a scientific and technological way. By doing so, they can become undertakers and masters of scientific farming.
					
					Stepping up the cultural revolution in the countryside is one of the important tasks for building a civilized socialist nation.
					
					 The agricultural workers should be involved in the study-while-you-work system in line with the requirements of making all the people be well-versed in science and technology, and prepared as intelligent workers of a new era possessed of agricultural knowledge and science and technology. By effectively running the halls of culture in ri and agricultural sci-tech learning spaces in farms and workteams, the agricultural workers can acquire scientific and technological knowledge concerned with farming and other fields as befit masters of the cultured socialist countryside. 
					
					 UAWK organizations should make sports mass-based and part of daily life in the countryside, so as to increase the ranks of model sports units and make the enthusiasm for sports prevail in the rural villages across the country. They should conduct various forms of mass-based cultural and artistic activities to make the songs of struggle and life ring out in the farm fields and encourage the agricultural workers to work and live in an optimistic way, filled with revolutionary enthusiasm.
					
					 UAWK members in the rural education and public health sectors should improve the level of education of rising generations and medical service by thoroughly implementing our Party's policies on education and public health.
					
					 UAWK organizations should lead their members and other agricultural workers to spruce up their villages and houses in a hygienic and cultured way, plant fruit trees at every house and cover the mountains around their villages with thick forests out of warm affection for their country and native lands, so as to turn the rural villages into civilized and beautiful socialist paradises.
					
					 They should enlist their members and other agricultural workers in the struggle to carry out the Party's agricultural policy, and thus effect a radical turn in agricultural production.
					
					 The agricultural front is an outpost in the battle for defending socialism. We must farm well and thus solve the problem of food for the people; only then can we defend our style of socialism and build a powerful socialist country successfully.
					
					 UAWK organizations and agricultural workers should attain by all means the agricultural production target set by the Seventh Party Congress and make our country rich in grains, vegetables, meat and fruits by bringing about a great innovation and great leap forward in agricultural production.
					
					 The masters of farming are farmers, and the key to increased agricultural production lies in inspiring the agricultural workers with enthusiasm for production. They should do all farm work in a scientific way and assiduously and meticulously as required by the Juche farming method from the standpoint of being masters responsible for filling the country's granaries, and execute the agricultural production plan without fail. The field responsibility system should be introduced as intended by the Party, so as to enhance the sense of responsibility and enthusiasm for production on the part of the agricultural workers.
					
					UAWK organizations should carry out the Party's policy on scientific farming.
					
					 The present is an era of scientific farming, and agricultural production is guaranteed not by natural and climatic conditions but by agricultural science and technology.
					
					 To bring about a turn in agricultural production, it is imperative to breed many high-yielding, superior grain species and propagate them on a large scale by holding fast to the Party's policy on the seed revolution as the lifeline. Along with it, efforts should be concentrated on fully solving the scientific and technological problems arising in agricultural development such as studying and developing advanced farming techniques and methods and inventing and introducing high-performance farm machines and implements.
					
					 The agricultural sector should breed seeds and distribute crops correctly as suited to the features of relevant localities, manure and cultivate them on a scientific and technological basis, actively introduce advanced farming methods and establish the food production cycle, thus putting farming on a higher scientific and intensive footing. The sector should ensure that the validity and vitality of the Party's policy on scientific farming are manifested in practice frequently and vividly by increasing the number of farms, workteams and sub-workteams that conduct farming on the strength of science and technology and enjoy the benefits of science and technology.
					
					 UAWK members and other agricultural workers should take loving care of their lands and farm machines and implements.
					
					Land is the basic means of production in agriculture, and farm machines and implements are weapons and combat equipment for agricultural workers. UAWK organizations should ensure that their members and other agricultural workers tend the farm fields as meticulously as they would do the gardens of their own houses, and treasure and take good care of farm machines and implements. UAWK members and other agricultural workers should be encouraged to produce a larger quantity of quality manure to apply it to paddy and non-paddy fields, and make the acidified fields fertile by spreading slaked lime on them, carpeting them with fresh soil and planting legumes on them. They should also be led to keep and maintain tractors and other farm machines and facilities for agricultural production properly, repair them in time and use them effectively.
					
					 UAWK organizations should launch mass movements vigorously among the agricultural workers.
					
					 Mass movements are powerful means for rousing the revolutionary enthusiasm and creativity of the agricultural workers and for boosting agricultural production through collective innovation. Vigorously launching mass movements in the rural areas is an important task assigned to UAWK organizations.
					
					 These organizations should widely organize and conduct mass movements including the socialist emulation drive, movement to create model lathes following the example of Lathe No. 26, mass technical innovation drive and various do-good-deeds movements so as to inspire the agricultural workers continuously with enthusiasm for production.
					
					 The farming sector should increase the ranks of model cooperative farms continuously by encouraging provinces, counties that produce large crops and cooperative farms to compete fiercely to increase unit-area yields.
					
					 The stockbreeding sector should launch a competition aimed at breeding more species of domestic animals, strong in viability and quick in gaining weight, propagating them widely and overfulfilling the meat, egg and milk production plans. The fruit-growing sector should conduct the competition with the focus put on producing delicious fruits in larger amounts by putting fruit farming on a higher scientific and intensive footing. Competitions should also be organized to increase the production of vegetables, potato and cash crops.
					
					UAWK organizations should control and guide the mass movements efficiently. A fair judgment should be made on the results of the socialist competitions and their review and evaluation should be conducted in a meaningful way to make the mass movements undertakings of the agricultural workers themselves; then, the agricultural workers can exchange and learn good experiences they have gained while conducting these movements.
					
					 The UAWK should render an active contribution to the struggle for realizing the independent reunification of the country and global independence.
					
					 It should strive to implement the great leaders' instructions and the Party's line on national reunification. It should strengthen solidarity and collaboration with the progressive peasants unions in south Korea and render support to the peasants and other people in south Korea in their struggle for anti-US independence, democratization of society and national reunification.
					
					 It should defend the high international prestige of the great leaders and their achievements in external activities, steadfastly apply the ideals and principles of our Party's foreign policy and strengthen friendly exchanges, cooperation and solidarity with peasants organizations in various countries of the world, so as to contribute to creating an international environment favourable for our revolution.
					
					 It is imperative to build up UAWK organizations and improve their militant functions and role.
					
					 A revolutionary work system and discipline should be established in the UAWK.
					
					 UAWK organizations should establish throughout the union a well-regulated work system of moving as one under the unified leadership of the Party Central Committee and accepting the Party's lines and policies unconditionally and carrying them out and of planning their work by giving top priority to the implementation of their basic duty and controlling and guiding the efforts to this end in a responsible way. They should establish rigid discipline of working in line with the demands of the Rules of the union and ensure that their officials and members do not commit acts that violate the organizational discipline.
					
					 The Central Committee of the UAWK should plan the overall work of the union as intended by the Party and provide unified guidance over it, so as to make its organizations at all levels active, living bodies. It should conduct effective organizational and political work for implementing the great leaders' instructions and the Party's policies related with the union work, and provide scrupulous control and guidance to its organizations.
					
					Provincial, city and county committees of the UAWK should hold as their main task the internal work aimed at strengthening the lower-echelon organizations organizationally and ideologically. They should establish a well-knit system of controlling and guiding these organizations, and go down to them and help them properly. 
					
					 Primary organizations of the UAWK should be strengthened. To strengthen them, grass-roots organizations of the UAWK, is the basis and starting point for strengthening the union as a whole. UAWK organizations at all levels should render assistance to its primary organizations effectively as intended by the Party, so as to turn them all into organizations with high fighting efficiency. They should push forward the movement of creating model primary organizations and increase their ranks.
					
					 The whole of the UAWK should put the main emphasis on the work with its members, the essence of its work. 
					
					 They should properly conduct the work with its core, active members and lead them to play the vanguard role in carrying out their revolutionary tasks and become models for the masses in all aspects. They should direct strenuous efforts to the work with the laggards. There is no person in the world who was born with bad qualities, nor is there a person who cannot be educated and transformed in our socialist society. They should look after more warmly those who trouble themselves inwardly with their prospects and living conditions and foster and promote their positive deeds, however negligible they may be, so as to transform them into progressive and active elements.
					
					 Organizational life should be intensified among UAWK members. UAWK organizations are the bases of political life for their members; through the organizational life, UAWK members are linked inseparably with the Party with an intention and feeling of kinship and are trained to be revolutionaries. Intensifying the organizational life among the agricultural workers is all the more important as they work scattered in many cases. UAWK organizations should improve the level of the organizational and ideological life of their members by providing guidance over their organizational life substantially with a proper methodology. They should ensure that all their members treasure their organizations, work and live by relying on their organizations and carry out the decisions and assignments of their organizations without fail.    They should ensure that they take part in every gathering such as a meeting and study session.
					
					 UAWK officials should raise their own political and practical qualifications and improve their methods and style of work.
					
					Whether the union work is conducted properly in line with the Party's intention or not depends on the political and practical qualifications, abilities and role of its officials. The officials should keep Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as their steadfast faith, be well-versed in the agricultural policy of the Party, possess economic, scientific and technological knowledge and common knowledge of different sectors and have high cultural attainments. UAWK organizations should scrupulously organize the work of improving the qualifications of their officials by various methods like workshops, demonstration lectures and meetings for swapping experiences.
					
					 UAWK officials should learn from Comrade Kim Jong Il's methods of work and apply them in their work thoroughly. They should always go deep among the masses and, while working together with the union members on the field, explain to them the Party's policies and the scientific and technological problems and common knowledge for raising good crops.
					
					 They should be modest in front of the masses, mix themselves with them unceremoniously and make efforts to solve the problems arising among the union members. They should smell of earth and be exemplary in their speaking and behaviour for the union members.
					
					 They should eliminate formalism, expediency, clinging to the outdated way and laxity in their work, and establish a creative and enterprising style of work.
					
					 Party organizations should effectively guide and help UAWK organizations in their work.
					
					 Party organizations at all levels should direct their efforts to building up the ranks of UAWK officials. They should build these ranks with those who are loyal to the Party, have high political and practical qualifications, are tempered in the practical struggle and enjoy trust among the masses.     They should pay close attention to educating these officials so that they can become doer-type officials who support the Party with high results in their work. They should grasp from among UAWK members who work at the production sites promising men and women as reserve officials for the UAWK, and train them systematically.
					
					 Party organizations should promptly inform UAWK organizations of the Party's policies and directives advanced in each period, control and guide their implementation; in particular, they should throw their weight behind them so that they can conduct various mass movements vigorously.
					
					 They should enhance the independence of UAWK organizations so that they can conduct their work boldly, creatively and on their own initiative with an attitude befitting masters. They should be bold in assigning tasks to the UAWK officials, help them carry out the tasks by relying on their own efforts and provide them with adequate conditions for their work.     They should ensure that such practices as assigning burdensome social tasks to UAWK organizations and seconding their officials at random to other projects are not revealed.
					
					 It is the firm will of our Party to carry out its plan of socialist rural construction and successfully accomplish the Juche-oriented socialist cause by strengthening the UAWK and enhancing its militant functions and role, true to the noble intentions of the great leaders.
					
					 I am firmly convinced that UAWK organizations and all its members will perform with credit their honourable mission and duties in developing the UAWK and implementing the Juche-oriented socialist cause.

articles.title: 8th Congress of UAWK Held
articles.content:
8th Congress of UAWK Held
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- The 8th Congress of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) was held here on Tuesday and Wednesday.
					 The Congress reviewed the successes and experience gained in the work of the union after the 7th Congress and discussed tasks and ways for the union to realize the work of modeling it on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as required by the demand of the new era of the Juche revolution and creditably discharging their mission and duty as reliable transmission belt of the party and peripheral organization.
					
					 Present there were delegates who were elected at the conferences of the union at all levels.
					
					 Party and administrative officials of relevant fields attended the congress as observers.
					
					 The Congress approved the following agenda items:
					
					1. On the review of the work of the Central Committee of the UAWK.
					
					2. On the review of the Central Auditing Commission of the UAWK.
					
					3. On revision of the rules of the UAWK.
					
					4. On the election of the central guidance organ of the union.
					
					Conveyed at the congress was a letter "On Improving the Role of the UAWK in Accomplishing the Juche-oriented Socialist Cause" sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un to the participants in the 8th Congress of the UAWK.
					
					 Introduced there were congratulatory messages and letters sent by political parties, agricultural workers' organizations and social organizations of different countries on the occasion of the 8th Congress of the UAWK.
					
					 Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the UAWK, made a report on the first agenda item.
					
					 The reporter said that Kim Jong Un sent the letter to the participants in the 8th Congress of the UAWK, in which he set for it as the general target and task of the union to model the whole union on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The period since the 7th Congress of the UAWK is the proud days when it got the agricultural workers united close around the party, aroused them to carry out the Theses on Socialist Rural Question and the party's agricultural revolutionary policy under the wise leadership of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, and thus performed shining feats in the history of the socialist rural construction, the reporter said. 
					
					 The union steadily developed all organizations of the union into the genuine mass political organization of the leader, true to the idea and cause of the leader under the leadership of the party with loyalty, he said, adding:
					
					 Under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un, the union held fast to the Party's line on the three revolution -- ideological, technical and cultural-- and the Theses on the Socialist Rural Question as the main task and dynamically encouraged agricultural workers and other members of the union to the struggle for building the socialist countryside and implementing the party's policy on effecting a drastic turn in agricultural production.
					
					 He said the undying exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un who put forward the union as reliable defender and helper of the party faithful to the cause of Juche revolution, Songun revolution will shine long with history.
					
					 Then followed speeches on the first agenda item.
					
					 A decision on the first agenda item was adopted.
					
					 Sin Chang Song, chairman of the Central Auditing Commission of the UAWK, made a report on the second agenda item.
					
					 The third agenda item was discussed.
					
					 A decision on the revised rules of the union was adopted.
					
					 Then there was a discussion on the fourth agenda item.
					
					 The congress elected the Central Committee of the UAWK.
					
					 Candidates for members and alternate members of the Central Committee of the union were elected its members and alternate members.
					
					  There was an election on the Central Auditing Commission of the union.
					
					  The candidates for the members of the commission were elected members of the commission.
					
					 The contents of the decision of the First Plenary Meeting of the 8th Central Committee of the UAWK were made public there. 
					
					The executive committee of the union was elected.
					
					Ri Myong Gil was elected chairman of the C.C., the union and Han Kyong Song, Ryo Hye Jong, Kil Sang Bong and O Ki Baek vice-chairpersons.
					
					 An organizing committee of the Central Committee of the union was formed.  
					
					 Department directors of the C.C, the union were appointed. The editor-in-chief of Nongop Kulloja, an organ of the C.C., the union, was appointed.
					
					 The results of the election of the chairman and vice-chairpersons of the Central Auditing Commission of the union held at the First Plenary Meeting of the 8th Central Auditing Commission of the union were made public.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers' Dancing Party Held
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers' Dancing Party Held
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- A peasants' dancing party was held Wednesday to celebrate the 8th Congress of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK).
					   Among its audience were Vice-Chairman Kim Ki Nam and Department Director Ri Il Hwan of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the UAWK Central Committee, participants in the 8th UAWK Congress, and agricultural workers in the city.
					
					 The performers at a narrative said about benevolent loving care shown by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who put forward the peasants as master of land and country and provided them with happy life.
					
					  They also presented cheerful dances, turning round decorative tassels to the tune of such songs as "A Bumper Harvest in the Chongsan Plain".
					
					 The atmosphere of dancing party reached the height when light music such as "Sea of Apples at Foot of Chol Pass" resounded throughout the venue.

articles.title: Birthday Party for Participants in 8th Congress of UAWK Given
articles.content:
Birthday Party for Participants in 8th Congress of UAWK Given
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- A birthday party for participants in the 8th Congress of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) was given at the April 25 Hotel on Thursday.
					 Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the C.C., UAWK, in a speech said that supreme leader Kim Jong Un made sure that the 8th UAWK Congress was successfully held and birthday spreads were provided for the participants greeting their birthdays during the congress.
					
					 This reflected the great expectation and trust of Kim Jong Un that the participants in the congress would glorify their worthwhile life on the road of following the Party and creditably discharge their honorable mission and duty in the development of the union and the struggle for building a powerful socialist country, he said.
					
					 He called upon all participants to do their best to repay the love and benevolence of Kim Jong Un with loyalty while keeping in their mind the present honor.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Gambian President-elect
articles.content:
Greetings to Gambian President-elect
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Gambian President-elect Adama Barrow.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger and wished the president-elect success in his responsible work for the development of the country and welfare of its people.

articles.title: DPRK Red Cross Hits U.S. for Resorting to Anti-DPRK Human Rights Campaign
articles.content:
DPRK Red Cross Hits U.S. for Resorting to Anti-DPRK Human Rights Campaign
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Red Cross Society of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Thursday as regards the fact that the U.S. House of Representatives passed a "resolution" on the reunion of "divided families" of Korean residents in the U.S.:
					 The U.S. House of Representatives on Nov. 29 passed a "resolution" demanding the DPRK allow Koreans in the U.S. to meet their families and relatives living in the north and take a "confidence-building measure" conducive to ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					After the passage of the "resolution," U.S. congressmen talk rubbish that "a cornerstone was provided for the reunion of separated families of 100,000 Koreans in the U.S." and "it is wish of the divided families in the U.S."
					
					 As acknowledged by the world, the U.S. is the chief culprit who caused the division of the Korean nation and thus spawned the issue of divided families and relatives and who is preventing their reunions by pursuing a hideous hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. brought huge aggression troops to south Korea every year and ceaselessly held provocative nuclear war exercises against the DPRK, deliberately scuttling the reunions of divided families and relatives in the north and the south and has persistently checked the visit of overseas Koreans to homeland by slapping sanctions against the DPRK and taking measures for stifling it.
					
					 This is the undeniable nature of the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK has so far kept the door open for overseas Koreans including those in the U.S. to visit their dear homeland any time and taken every sincere compatriotic measure to ensure their meetings with their families and relatives as desired by them.
					
					 However, U.S. Congress cooked up a "bill for supporting reunions of divided families in the U.S." in January 2008 and fabricated a "resolution" demanding for reunions this time. This is chiefly aimed to use this issue as a pretext for kicking up a human rights campaign against the DPRK and as a smokescreen for covering up the despicable nature as a criminal responsible for the division of the Korean nation under the veil of "humanitarianism."
					
					 The U.S. crafty moves to misuse even the reunion of divided families and relatives of Koreans in the U.S. for anti-DPRK human rights racket will only further reveal the U.S. sinister intention and impudence.

articles.title: Press Release of North Side Preparatory Committee for Joint Conference
articles.content:
Press Release of North Side Preparatory Committee for Joint Conference
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- The north side preparatory committee for a joint conference of political parties, organizations and personages in the north and the south and abroad for the peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula issued a press release on Thursday. 
					 According to it, a general meeting of the north side preparatory committee was held here on Thursday.
					
					 Present at the meeting were members of the north side preparatory committee and officials concerned.
					
					 The meeting informed in detail of a working meeting of the north, south and overseas sides held in Shenyang, China from Nov. 30 to Dec. 1.
					
					 Its participants were unanimous in stressing the need to surely hold a nationwide grand gathering for reunification with the attendance of the representatives of political parties and organizations and personages of various circles at home and abroad and thus remove the mistrust, antagonism, hostility and confrontation between the north and the south and bring about a radical turn in realizing the peace and independent reunification of the country.
					
					 The meeting discussed the preparations for the nationwide grand gathering for reunification and the ways for its success and adopted relevant decisions.
					
					 As discussed at the working meeting of the north, south and overseas sides, it decided to call the nationwide grand gathering for reunification the "All Koreans Conference for Peace and Reunification of the Country and Development of North-South Relations" (All Koreans Conference) and appointed members of the north side working committee, under an agreement on setting up a joint working committee of the north, south and overseas sides for the preparation of the All Koreans Conference within this year. 
					
					 At the meeting, Ri Son Gwon, chairman of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country of the DPRK, and Pak Myong Chol, director of the Secretariat of the C.C., Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea, were elected vice-chairmen of the north side preparatory committee for the All Koreans Conference to fill the vacancy.

articles.title: Delegation of DPRK Ministry of Culture Returns
articles.content:
Delegation of DPRK Ministry of Culture Returns
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the DPRK Ministry of Culture led by Minister Pak Chun Nam returned home Thursday after participating in the 5th International Cultural Forum held in Sankt-Peterburg of Russia.

articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Thai Crown Prince
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Thai Crown Prince
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a reply message from Maha Vajiralongkorn, crown prince of the Kingdom of Thailand, on Nov. 30.
					 In the reply message the Thai crown prince expressed thanks in the name of the queen and the family of the Royal House to Kim Jong Un for having extended support to them and the Thai people in the hardest time of Thailand.
					
					 The crown prince thanked Kim Jong Un for his kind solicitude, saying that deep condolences extended by him served as a source of great consolation.

articles.title: Delegation of Chongryon KNS Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegation of Chongryon KNS Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean News Service (KNS) of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) led by Director Choe Hong visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Members of the delegation went round the historic relics preserved at the old home of the President, being briefed on his revolutionary life.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Sci-Tech Complex, the Nature Museum, the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, etc.

articles.title: National Sci-Tech Presentation in Field of Salt Production Held
articles.content:
National Sci-Tech Presentation in Field of Salt Production Held
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- A national sci-tech presentation in the field of salt production was held in Onchon County, Nampho City of the DPRK on Dec. 7-8 under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Taking part in it were officials and teachers, researchers, technicians and graduate students and students from Kim Il Sung University, the Salt Industry Management Bureau, the Geology Research Institute of the State Academy of Sciences and other units.
					
					 Its participants heard more than 60 papers on the achievements made in applying the new way of producing salt by use of underground ultra-saline water and settling the sci-tech problems to put the salt production processes on a comprehensive mechanization and scientific basis.

articles.title: National Hard-finned Sandfish Cooking Competition Held
articles.content:
National Hard-finned Sandfish Cooking Competition Held
 Wonsan, December 8 (KCNA) -- A national hard-finned sandfish cooking competition was held in Wonsan City, Kangwon Province of the DPRK, on Dec. 7-8.
					 Taking part in the competition, sponsored by the C.C., Korean Association of Cooks, were 50 public catering establishments in different parts of the country.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Observe Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Observe Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise
 Chongjin, December 8 (KCNA) -- There took place a remembrance meeting at Chongjin Port on Thursday to observe the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present at the meeting were the captain and crewmen of the Tanzania-flagged ship Everbright.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Chongjin City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 The speakers stressed that Kim Jong Il is the general with matchless pluck and guts and the greatest man with distinguished leadership qualities and noble personality.
					
					 They said that though he passed away, the Korean people and other progressive people of the world would always remember him.
					
					 A letter to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Ancient Tombs Unearthed in DPRK
articles.content:
Ancient Tombs Unearthed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- Archaeologists of the DPRK Academy of Social Sciences have recently unearthed a large group of tombs dating back to Koguryo Kingdom (B.C. 277-A.D. 668).
					 In this regard, Dr. Cha Man Dal, head of an excavating party under the Archaeological Institute of the academy, told KCNA:
					
					 The group tombs are located on a hill, about 2 kilometers northeast of Chondok-ri seat, Pongsan County of North Hwanghae Province.
					
					 There are nearly 30 tombs in four rows in an area of 185 square meters with individual ones around it, which shows the area was a big burial site with hundreds tombs.
					
					 Most of tombs are 10 meters in diameter and 2 meters in height and the biggest one is 17 meters in diameter and 2.4 meters in height. The tombs are arranged at intervals of 10-20 meters and can be divided into the earthen one with a stone chamber and the other with two stone chambers, all of them with arch-style or inclined-plane ceilings before getting collapsed.
					
					 Unearthed from the tombs were human and horse bones, bronze spoons and decorations, silver-clad iron nails, iron handles of coffin, grey earthenware and other remains.
					
					 The newly-unearthed tombs and remains will serve as material evidence to give fresh understanding of advanced cultural development of Koguryo, a powerful state that existed in the East for a thousand years, and precious treasures showing the good qualities of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Great Life of Devotion for People
articles.content:
Great Life of Devotion for People
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il devoted his all to the wellbeing of people, regarding it as his lifetime motto to believe in the people as in Heaven.
					 It was his creed and will that the popular masses are an almighty being and one should pluck even a star and bring a flower into bloom even on a rock if they want. 
					
					 Taking his pleasure in people's happiness, he made a ceaseless journey of field guidance for their wellbeing till the last moments of his life, despite of mental and physical fatigue.
					
					 It was his absolute criterion and iron rule to meet the demands and opinion of people in adopting any policy and realize them without fail. 
					
					 The number of units he visited in his lifetime reaches over 14 290 units and total distance of his field guidance more than 670,000 kilometers.
					
					 Indeed, Kim Jong Il was the great leader who always found himself among the people and dedicated his all for the happiness of people.

articles.title: "Sinau", National Instrumental Music Heritage
articles.content:
"Sinau", National Instrumental Music Heritage
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- "Sinau" is one of the instrumental music heritages of the Korean nation.
					 "Sinau" is a military music which had been widely executed by folk instrumental troupes and individuals in the period of the Feudal Joson Dynasty (1392-1910).
					
					 Koreans used to play "Sinau" with Thungso (a Korean bamboo flute) and bamboo fife.
					
					 Now, "Sinau" was re-created into different forms like chorus and orchestral music with national instruments, including drum, gong, Janggu, haegum (a Korean fiddle) and tanso (a Korean short bamboo flute), involved.
					
					 It gains popularity among people for its strong national coloring, dynamic melody and peculiar mood.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Puppet Forces' Talk about "Independent Sanctions"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Puppet Forces' Talk about "Independent Sanctions"
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean puppet forces made public "proposal for independent sanctions" before anyone else after the UNSC fabricated the illegal "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK.
					 Puppet Prime Minister Hwang Kyo An blustered that the south Korean regime would check "provocation" from someone through their "cooperation with the international community".
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a commentary terms the group of traitors' action the last-ditch efforts of the confrontational maniacs who are working hard to completely freeze the inter-Korean relations and take revenge on the north, while breathing their last.
					
					 Tragedy is that the group of traitors no more than harmful insects are foolish enough to calculate that they can block the just road chosen by the army and people of the DPRK through their nonsensical talk about what they call "independent sanctions." This ridiculous action amounts to jumping into the abyss of self-destruction, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 The DPRK is powerful enough to mercilessly smash "independent sanctions", group or additional sanctions sought by the hostile forces.
					
					 History and reality go to clearly prove that neither economic sanctions nor blockade by the hostile forces can ever work on the DPRK.
					
					 We warn the group of traitors seeking to stifle the compatriots in the north, not awakened from the daydream, though their miserable doomsday is fast approaching: No matter how desperately they may escalate the confrontation with the DPRK in collusion with outside forces, they can neither block the dynamic advance of all service personnel and civilians of the DPRK along the road of independence, Songun and socialism nor tide over their worst crisis.
					
					 Their hysteria will only precipitate their shameful destruction.

articles.title: Sophism of Human Rights Abusers Will Not Work: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Sophism of Human Rights Abusers Will Not Work: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and its vassal forces again railroaded an anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" peppered with lies and fabrications through the third committee of the 71st UN General Assembly shortly ago.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Thursday says:
					
					 We can never acknowledge the "human rights resolution" as it is not worth even a passing note.
					
					 But we cannot but reveal the true colors of the U.S. and its henchmen now that they are styling themselves "exemplary nations in terms of human rights" and "human rights judges" while misleading the public opinion and branding the DPRK as a "human rights abuser".
					
					 The U.S. is the empire of evil which has committed the cruelest human rights abuses not only in its own country but in different parts of the world.
					
					 It was exactly the U.S. which caused a big furor in the world by barbarously torturing prisoners at secret prisons it built in different parts of the world.
					
					 The same is the case with Japan where one is vulnerable to all crimes that have become daily occurrences there.
					
					 The same can be said of Britain and some other European countries which professes model of human rights performance.
					
					 Such countries with the world's poorest human rights records drafted the "resolution" and those countries that are used to blindly follow them raised their hands to pass the recent "human rights resolution" against the DPRK.
					
					 This is the inveterate and hidebound bad habit of the hostile forces to fault others to meet their own interests even by cooking up fictions through lies and swindles.
					
					 The commentary urges the U.S. and its yes-men to be more concerned about correcting their own mistakes, rather than concentrating on doing harm to others by using misinformation.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Japanese Reactionaries for Evading Apology and Reparation for Past Crimes
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Japanese Reactionaries for Evading Apology and Reparation for Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- A Japanese professor shortly ago demanded that the authorities make an official apology over the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 Honorary professor at Tokyo University Haruki Wada chided the present chief executive for refusing to make an apology for the sexual slavery through an official document despite the unanimous protest and denunciation at home and abroad and urged the government to make an apology and reparation to victims of sexual slavery not only in south Korea but in other parts of the world.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Thursday says his remarks are so meaningful as they are made at a time when the Japanese reactionaries are crying out for a final and irreversible "solution" to the issue of sexual slavery.
					
					 His demand for the chief executive's official apology can be viewed as an expression of the domestic mindset to part with the inglorious past, the news analyst notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is elementary moral ethics to make sincere apology and reparation to the victims for what one has done.
					
					 It is no exception in terms of relations among countries. But the Japanese reactionaries who are ill-famed for their craftiness and shamelessness are working hard to evade responsibility for their monstrous crimes in the past, far from making apology and reparation.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' attitude of not feeling guilty conscience at all, far from making apology and reparation for the past crimes, clearly betrays their vulgar nature as a political dwarf.
					
					  If the Japanese reactionaries go arrogant as now, they will have to pay a very high price, warns the commentary.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on S. Korean Regime's Projected Introduction of "State-compiled History Textbooks"
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on S. Korean Regime's Projected Introduction of "State-compiled History Textbooks"
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- The offending nature of the "introduction of state-compiled history textbooks" being pushed forward by the Park Geun Hye regime of south Korea has been brought to light.
					 Recently, the puppet regime of south Korea posted to-be-screened copies of the "state-compiled history textbooks" on internet. And it announced that it would introduce them around next March into all middle and high school across south Korea after "supplementing and completing" them.
					
					 The copies written by some ultra-right conservative pseudo-historians at back parlors are peppered with paradox embellishing the treacherous rule and fascist dictatorship of the successive rulers of south Korea including traitor Park Chung Hee and inciting confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					
					 The puppet regime is getting desperate in twisting the truth of history in a bid to cover up the crime-woven history stained with disgrace and high treason. This is also aimed to benumb the consciousness of independence of the rising generation in south Korea by instilling into them the reactionary outlook on history and hostility toward the compatriots in the north and thus turn the south Korean society into a conservative and reactionary one generation after generation. This base act constitutes a crime against the nation.
					
					 The "introduction of state-compiled history textbooks" is, in essence, a fabrication of history to help Park realize her sinister design to "restore" the "honor" of her father and justify the crimes he committed by pursuing pro-U.S., pro-Japanese acts and dictatorial rule.
					
					 To "restore the honor" of traitor Park Chung Hee is the lifetime goal of Park Geun Hye.
					
					 Park has worked hard to have the grudge of him who met miserable death settled, openly praising her father as her mentor and teacher. 
					
					 Since she became the boss of Chongwadae by grabbing power in an illegal manner, she has buckled down to reviving the "yusin" dictatorship and changing history textbooks.
					
					 Claiming "students should study with balanced textbooks", not with the existing ones "leaning to left", Park gave a curtain-raiser to the debate on "introduction of state-compiled history textbooks."
					
					 Despite the strong protests of historians, teachers and other people of various circles, the Park regime has persisted in distorting history though it faces the worst ruling crisis.
					
					 Park schemes to introduce the "state-compiled history textbooks" in the run-up to the next year's 100th birth anniversary of her father, an extension of her moves to "restore his honor."
					
					 Traitor Park is the worst source of trouble for the nation that should never go with impunity as she abused even history textbooks, which should be used to teach the right outlook on history and nation to the rising generation, for the purpose of realizing her wild ambition.
					
					 No wonder, south Koreans set fire to the old home of Park Chung Hee's family and vandalized "monuments" to the old dictator amid the growing voices of the public censuring the "state-compiled textbooks" as "pro-U.S., pro-Japanese textbooks embellishing dictatorship of Park Chung Hee" and "monster-like ones twisting history", demanding the retraction of their introduction and resignation of Park Geun Hye.
					
					 Those who are beautifying the crime-woven history of the "yusin" dictator and challenging the truth of history deserve such frosty reception from the public.

articles.title: Struggle against Big Businesses Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle against Big Businesses Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions reportedly staged an action denouncing big businesses who are accomplices of traitor Park Geun Hye's scandal.
					 Members of the organization held a protest at a building of the "National Federation of Businessmen" (Jongyongryon) on December 5, calling for a strict investigation into the big businesses involved in the "Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal".
					
					 They demanded an immediate disbandment of Jongyongryon for its involvement in bribery.
					
					 The next day the Confederation held a candlelight rally urging the immediate resignation of Park, custody of tycoons and disbandment of Jongyongryon.

articles.title: Workers in S. Korea Stage Candlelight Action Urging Park's Resignation
articles.content:
Workers in S. Korea Stage Candlelight Action Urging Park's Resignation
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- Workers affiliated to the health trade union of south Korea held a candlelight march in demand of Park Geun Hye's resignation, the abrogation of evil labor law and the suspension of privatization of health service on Tuesday, according to the south Korean newspaper Nodong and Segye.
					 The demonstrators denounced the present regime's policy that served to monopolize "state administration", meet the interests of individuals and bring benefits to big businesses.
					
					 Saying the Park regime totally lost confidence of the people, they called for bringing down Park by the efforts of the workers.

articles.title: Bust of Park Chung-Hee Spoiled in S. Korea
articles.content:
Bust of Park Chung-Hee Spoiled in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- A bust of Park Chung-Hee in Yongdungpho, Seoul of south Korea, was destroyed on Dec. 5, according to media reports from Seoul.
					 The top part of the bust including the head was sprayed with red paint, some parts of it were spoiled and a word "withdraw" was seen on its support.
					
					 Voice of People, CBS and other media, widely reporting the news, said that the bust of Park Chung-Hee was discovered spoiled in Seoul and that this showed the towering resentment of the south Korean people.

articles.title: S. Korean Religionists Urge Park Geun Hye to Accept Demand for Resignation
articles.content:
S. Korean Religionists Urge Park Geun Hye to Accept Demand for Resignation
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Tongil News said that the south Korean Buddhist Jogye Order called an emergency news conference in Seoul on Dec. 6, at which it made pubic an appeal urging Park Geun Hye to step down at once as required by the mind-set of the south Korean people.
					 The appeal said that millions of people have taken to streets with candles in their hands, demanding Park follow the intention of the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered by Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered by Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- A meeting for remembering leader Kim Jong Il took place at Korean University run by the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on December 2, with the approach of the fifth anniversary of his demise.
					 Present there were Jang Pyong Thae, head of Korean University, and its teaching staff, students and graduate students.
					
					 At the meeting performers explained and depicted the brilliant leadership and warm love of Kim Jong Il who trusted Korean University as the only base for training new core members of Chongryon and wisely led it.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Myanmar Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Myanmar Figure
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- Tin Tun, chairman of the Myanmar Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, issued a statement on Dec. 3 on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Paying highest tribute to Kim Jong Il on the anniversary, he said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il was the great leader and benevolent father of the people who dedicated all his life to the people's happiness and the country's prosperity.
					
					 He performed immortal exploits in accomplishing the human cause of independence with his matchless and distinguished idea and leadership ability.
					
					 He is always alive in the mind of the progressive mankind as he had conducted energetic external activities to build a new world to which the idea of independence, peace and friendship is applied.
					
					 His exploits for the cause of global independence will remain long with century.

articles.title: Events Held in Countries to Remember Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Events Held in Countries to Remember Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 8 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries from Nov. 20 to Dec. 2 to commemorate the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Lectures were given in Russia, Austria and Mali and book exhibition and film shows held in Nigeria.
					
					 On display in the venues of the events were books introducing the revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the achievements made by the army and people of the DPRK in building a thriving socialist power under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The head of the Center for Asian-Pacific International Relations Studies in Khabarovsk of Russia referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il defended socialism and laid a solid foundation for the country's prosperity with the might of the Songun politics.
					
					 The head of Progres School in Mali said that the Korean people have wrought world-startling miracles and innovations one after another in all the spheres of social life.
					
					 A permanent secretary of the Niger State Government of Nigeria and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il for having turned the DPRK into an invincible socialist power under the banner of the Juche idea, the Songun idea and opened up a turning phase for Korea's reunification.
					
					 "The Sun of Songun Shedding Its Rays All over the World" and other Korean films were displayed at the film shows.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje a participantes en el VIII Congreso de UTAC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje a participantes en el VIII Congreso de UTAC
Pyongyang, 8 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Presidente Kim Jong Un envio el dia 6 un mensaje titulado "Para elevar el papel de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas en la obra socialista del Juche" a los participantes en el VIII Congreso de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea.
					En el mensaje, Kim Jong Un senalo que el presente conclave marcara un hito importante para glorificar las hazanas de los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il realizadas para el fortalecimiento y desarrollo de la UTAC y promover la construccion de potencia socialista al mejorar el papal de las organizaciones de ese gremio bajo la orientacion del partido, y prosiguio: 
					
					La UTAC fue fundada y desarrollada bajo la direccion de los grandes Lideres.
					
					A base de su original idea y tradicion sobre la construccion de organizacion campesina del tipo Juche, preparadas ya en el periodo de lucha revolucionaria antijaponesa, el Presidente Kim Il Sung organizo la union de campesinos de caracter patriotico y revolucionario despues de la liberacion del pais.
					
					Propicio cambios en la solucion del problema de campesinado y el agricola al llevar a feliz termino la reforma agraria y la cooperativizacion agricola e implementar la tesis rural socialista. A medida que se profundizaban la revolucion y la construccion, desarrollo la union de campesinos como la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il defendio y glorifico la idea y hazanas del Presidente en materia de la construccion del campo socialista y dirigio incansablemente para que las organizaciones de la union cumplieran su deber como entidades de educacion ideologica.  
					
					En cada decada de la revolucion, la UTAC y los trabajadores agricolas lucharon activamente por consolidar la trinchera clasista del campo en acato a la orientacion del partido y el lider y cumplir su responsabilidad y deber como duenos del sector agricola.
					
					Es posible consolidar firmemente las trincheras de la revolucion y cumplir exitosamente la causa de construccion de potencia socialista cuando la UTAC desempene mejor su papel, forme a los afiliados como verdaderos duenos del campo socialista y de el jaque mate en el sector agricola segun el proposito del partido. 
					
					A continuacion, Kim Jong Un presento las tareas y remedios que corresponden a la union.
					
					La identificacion de toda la union con el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo es la meta general y la tarea de lucha general de la UTAC. 
					
					La UTAC debe materializar los legados de los grandes Lideres en la construccion de si misma y sus actividades tomandolos como guia programatica. 
					
					Le compete movilizar sus organizaciones e integrantes en el cumplimiento de las tareas presentadas en la tesis rural socialista.
					
					Hay que prestar atencion primordial al cumplimiento cabal de la revolucion ideologica en el campo.
					
					Las organizaciones de la UTAC deben dar buen impulso a la revolucion tecnica y la cultural en el campo segun la demanda de la construccion de potencia cientifico-tecnica y la civilizada. 
					
					Los gremiales de las ramas de educacion y salud del campo deben elevar el nivel de la educacion para las generaciones venideras y del servicio medico al materializar cabalmente las politicas de nuestro partido sobre esos sectores. 
					
					Las organizaciones y los miembros de la UTAC deben alcanzar sin falta la meta de produccion cerealera presentada por el VII Congreso del PTC al lograr grandes innovaciones y saltos en la produccion agricola y convertir el pais en el que abunden los cereales, vegetales, carnes y frutas.
					
					Las organizaciones de la UTAC tienen la tarea de poner en practica la orientacion del partido sobre la agricultura cientifica.
					
					Ellas deben organizar y dinamizar los movimientos masivos entre los trabajadores agricolas. 
					
					A la UTAC corresponde la tarea de contribuir activamente a la lucha por la reunificacion independiente de la patria y la verificacion de la independencia en el mundo.
					
					Es imprescindible que ella se empene por materializar los legados de los grandes Lideres sobre la reunificacion de la patria y la linea del partido en la misma materia.
					
					Es preciso defender el alto prestigio internacional de los grandes Lideres y sus hazanas realizadas en las actividades exteriores, materializar invariablemente el ideal y los principios de la politica exterior de nuestro partido y hacer aporte a preparar el ambiente internacional favorable a la revolucion coreana al intensificar el intercambio amistoso, la cooperacion y la solidaridad con las organizaciones campesinas de varios paises del mundo.
					
					El partido mantiene la firme voluntad de realizar su proyecto sobre la construccion del campo socialista y cumplir la causa socialista del Juche al fortalecer la UTAC y elevar su funcion combativa y papel segun el proposito de los grandes Lideres.
					
					Al final del mensaje, Kim Jong Un expreso la seguridad de que las organizaciones de la UTAC y todos los gremiales cumpliran perfectamente con su mision y deber honrosos para el desarrollo de la union y el cumplimiento de la causa socialista del Juche.

articles.title: Tiene lugar el VIII Congreso de la UTAC
articles.content:
Tiene lugar el VIII Congreso de la UTAC
Pyongyang, 8 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 6 y 7 en esta capital el VIII Congreso de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea. 
					El conclave hizo balance de los exitos y experiencias alcanzados en las labores de la UTAC despues de su VII Congreso y discutio las tareas y remedios para transformarla segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo conforme a la demanda de nueva epoca de la revolucion del Juche y cumplir su mision y deber como fidedigna correa de transmision y organizacion auxiliar del Partido. 
					
					 Asistieron a la ocasion los delegados elegidos en las conferencias de la UTAC de todos los niveles.
					
					Y estuvieron presentes en calidad de observador los funcionarios partidistas y administrativos de los dominios relacionados.
					
					La reunion aprobo la siguiente agenda:
					
					1. Sobre las labores del Comite Central de la UTAC
					
					2. Sobre las labores de la Comision Central Revisora de la UTAC
					
					3. Sobre la enmienda de los estatutos de la UTAC
					
					4. Sobre la eleccion del organo de direccion central de la UTAC
					
					En la ocasion fue transmitido el mensaje "Para elevar el papel de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas en la obra socialista del Juche" enviado por el Presidente Kim Jong Un a los participantes en el VIII Congreso de la UTAC.
					
					Y se presentaron los mensajes y cartas de felicitacion remitidos por los partidos politicos, organizaciones de trabajadores agricolas y entidades sociales de varios paises del mundo con motivo del conclave.
					
					El informe sobre el primer punto de la agenda estuvo a cargo del presidente del Comite Central de la UTAC, Ri Myong Gil.
					
					El informante dijo que en su mensaje enviado a los participantes en el presente Congreso, Kim Jong Un presento la transformacion de toda la union segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo como la meta general y tarea de lucha general de la UTAC.
					
					Recordo que desde la anterior edicion del congreso, la UTAC ha registrado brillantes meritos en la historia de construccion del campo socialista, al agrupar firmemente en torno al Partido a amplios trabajadores agricolas y movilizarlos en la materializacion de la tesis rural socialista y la orientacion del Partido sobre la revolucion agricola, bajo la sabia orientacion de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu. 
					
					Menciono que bajo la guia del Partido, la UTAC vino fortaleciendo incesantemente todas sus filiales como autenticas organizaciones politicas de masas que apoyan con fidelidad la idea y la causa del lider. 
					
					Refirio que bajo la direccion de los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, la UTAC llamo a los trabajadores agricolas y los gremiales a la construccion del campo socialista y a la materializacion de la orientacion del Partido sobre la revolucion agricola tomando como tarea principal el cumplimiento de la linea del Partido sobre las tres revoluciones: la ideologica, la tecnica y la cultural, y de la tesis rural socialista. 
					
					Puntualizo que brillaran para siempre junto con la historia de la UTAC las imperecederas hazanas de orientacion de los grandes lideres y del Mariscal Kim Jong Un quienes la presentaron como fidedigno defensor, ayudante del partido que sigue fielmente la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun. 
					
					Luego, hubo intervenciones sobre el primer punto de la agenda y fue adoptada la resolucion correspondiente. 
					
					El presidente de la Comision Central Revisora de la UTAC, Sin Chang Song, presento el informe sobre el segundo punto.
					
					En el debate sobre el tercer punto, quedo aprobada la resolucion sobre la enmienda de los estatutos de la UTAC.
					
					Durante el debate del cuarto punto, fue elegido el Comite Central de la UTAC.
					
					Todos los candidatos propuestos fueron elegidos como miembros y miembros suplentes del CC de la UTAC. 
					
					Fue elegida la Comision Central Revisora de la UTAC.
					
					Todos los candidatos propuestos resultaron elegidos como miembros de la Comision.
					
					Se publico la decision del primer pleno del VIII periodo del CC de la UTAC.
					
					Fue elegida la Comision Ejecutiva del Comite Central de la UTAC. 
					
					Ri Myong Gil fue ratificado como presidente del CC de la UTAC, y Han Gyong Song, Ryo Hye Jong, Kil Sang Bong y O Ki Baek fueron elegidos como vicepresidentes.
					
					Quedo organizada la Comision de Organizacion del Comite Central de la UTAC.
					
					Fueron nombrados los jefes de departamento del CC de la UTAC y el editor-jefe de Nongop Kulloja, organo del CC de la UTAC.
					
					Se ha informado el resultado de elecciones del presidente y vicepresidentes de la Comision Central Revisora de la UTAC, efectuadas en el primer pleno del VIII periodo de la misma comision.

articles.title: Portavoz del CC de la ACR rechaza proyecto de resolucion aprobado en el Congreso de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Portavoz del CC de la ACR rechaza proyecto de resolucion aprobado en el Congreso de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 8 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En exclusiva con la ACNC concedida el dia 8 con motivo de que recientemente, la camara de representantes del Congreso de Estados Unidos aprobo el "proyecto de resolucion" sobre el problema de encuentro de familiares separados de los coreanos en EE.UU., el vocero del CC de la Asociacion de Cruz Roja de la RPDC dio la siguiente respuesta:
					El 29 de noviembre pasado, la camara de representantes del Congreso de EE.UU. aprobo el "proyecto de resolucion" que exige a la RPDC permitir el encuentro de los coreanos en EE.UU. con sus familiares y parientes en el Norte de Corea y tomar las "medidas para la creacion de confianza" que pueda contribuir a la preservacion de paz de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Despues de la aprobacion del "proyecto", los congresistas norteamericanos chismean que este documento "ha preparado la piedra angular para el encuentro de 100 mil coreanos en EE.UU. con sus familiares" y "esto es el deseo de ellos".
					
					Como reconoce todo el mundo, EE.UU. es responsable que ha engendrado el problema de familiares y parientes separados al dividir a la nacion coreana e impide hasta el encuentro de los consanguineos practicando la brutal politica hostil anti-RPDC.
					
					En particular, el imperio introduce anualmente gran numero de efectivos agresores en el suelo surcoreano y desarrolla sin parar los entrenamientos de guerra nuclear de caracter provocativo contra la RPDC. De esta manera, frustro intencionalmente el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados entre ambas partes coreanas y vino impidiendo las visitas de los compatriotas en ultramar a la RPDC practicando persistentemente la campana de sancion y aplastamiento.
					
					Hasta la fecha, la RPDC ha dejado abierta la puerta para que los compatriotas en EE.UU. y otros paises puedan visitar la patria cuando quisieran y vino tomando todas las medidas fraternales para facilitar el encuentro de ellos con sus familiares y parientes segun su voluntad y aspiracion.
					
					Sin embargo, el Congreso norteamericano volvio a fabricar esta vez el "proyecto de resolucion" luego de haber inventado en enero de 2008 la "ley de asistencia al encuentro de familiares separados en EE.UU.", lo cual persigue la meta principal de aprovechar este tema como pretexto de la campana de DDHH anti-RPDC y la cortina de humo para encubrir su naturaleza de criminal que dividio a la nacion coreana bajo el cartel de "humanitarismo".
					
					Cuanto mas el imperio intente emplear hasta el problema de encuentro en su campana de DDHH anti-RPDC, tanto mas se revelaran su mala intencion y cinismo.

articles.title: Publicada comunicacion oficial del comite preparatorio de parte Norte
articles.content:
Publicada comunicacion oficial del comite preparatorio de parte Norte
Pyongyang, 8 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El comite preparatorio de la parte Norte para la Conferencia Conjunta de Partidos Politicos, Entidades y Personalidades del Norte, el Sur y en Ultramar para la Paz y la Reunificacion Independiente de la Peninsula Coreana hizo publica el dia 8 una comunicacion oficial.
					Segun el documento, tuvo lugar el dia 8 en esta capital la reunion general del comite preparatorio de la parte Norte para la Conferencia Conjunta de Partidos Politicos, Entidades y Personalidades del Norte, el Sur y en Ultramar para la Paz y la Reunificacion Independiente de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					A la ocasion asistieron los miembros del comite norteno y los funcionarios interesados.
					
					Se informo detalladamente del estado de la reunion de trabajo del Norte, el Sur y el ultramar, efectuado en Shenyang de China del 30 de noviembre al primero de diciembre.
					
					En la reunion se acordo abrir sin falta el conclave pannacional bajo la participacion activa y el fervor entusiasmo de los representantes de los partidos politicos y entidades y las figuras de diversos estratos del Norte, el Sur y el ultramar, a fin de eliminar la desconfianza, la antipatia, la hostilidad y la confrontacion entre ambas partes coreanas y registrar un viraje radical en la realizacion de la empresa de la paz y la reunificacion independiente del pais.
					
					Se discutieron los problemas pendientes en los preparativos para la cita pannacional y los remedios para el fin y se aprobaron las resoluciones correspondientes.
					
					Denomino el nombre del conclave como la "Conferencia Pannacional para la Paz y la Reunificacion de la Patria y el Desarrollo de las Relaciones Intercoreanas" y fueron asignados los miembros del comite de trabajo de la parte Norte, segun la decision de organizar dentro este ano el comite conjunto de trabajo del Norte, el Sur y el ultramar para los preparativos de la conferencia pannacional.
					
					La reunion general eligio a Ri Son Gwon, presidente del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria, y Pak Myong Chol, director del Secretariado del CC del Frente Democratica para la Reunificacion de la Patria, como vicepresidentes del comite preparatorio norteno para la Conferencia Pannacional.
